markdownRemark.html:
I was strolling through the old town of Sao Paulo today and this idea for a satirical website popped up in my head, so I went home and knocked it up in a couple hours.

I present to you: Debate a Capitalist.com

Here’s the source code

I’m sure you’ve been in a debate where you’ve felt like you were just banging your head against a brick wall. This simulates that “debate” with a right-wing troll.

frontmatter.title: Made a Satirical Debate Site in a Couple Hours
How it feels to be back in the U.S. after 4 months in South America
